name: G.PIX: Drift Car Photo Jigsaw Puzzle
name_original: G.PIX: Drift Car Photo Jigsaw Puzzle
description:
Thank you for playing this Drift Car Photo Jigsaw Puzzle game!

It is a really fun and challenging game. Simply drag the puzzle pieces onto their correct white dots to see the full photo.

Ask your friends to play this game and try to beat your best time :) Good luck and Have fun!
